name: PocketVenture
description:
Disclaimer: I've started this game for #lowrezjam in 2014, but never finished it, so I gave it another try this year (and still haven't finish it)

A super minimalist classic RPG for #lowrezjam with exploration and turn-based combat.

Climb the Omega tower that is being build by the Dark Master, an evil demon trying to bring chaos to the world. On your adventure you learn about the history of the tower, what happens if it is ever finished and how you can stop the Dark Master.

Controls:

  1. Move with the arrow keys
  2. Accept or interact with Control
  3. Cancel with Alt
  4. Restart the game with Esc
  5. Delete your savefile with F1 (on the title screen)

Features:

  • Turn-based combat with three heroes, special skills and no bling-bling
  • Explore a tower full of traps and enemies
  • Talk to NPCs, read books and find secrets
